mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM post where type='${type}'
mapper.delete: DELETE from post where postNo=#{postNo} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into post (type,title,content,userId, createdDate) values ('${type}',#{postDto.title}, #{postDto.content}, #{postDto.userId}, now())
mapper.update: update post set viewCnt = viewCnt+1 where postNo=#{postNo}
